AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master chitin smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many years wandering the ashen wastes of Vvardenfell in search of some of the most skilled Ashlander crafters. Using their knowledge, [PAWN_pronoun] has perfected the use of chitin in crafting, producing armour and weapons that nearly rival ebony.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master bonemold smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is widely considered to be one of the best bonemold smiths to have ever existed. [PAWN_possessive] works adorn some of the highest ranking members of the Dunmer Great Houses, their worth proven many times in the field of battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master glass smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] inherited a great wealth of knowledge from [PAWN_possessive] parents. While most of this knowledge was fairly standard, [PAWN_pronoun] did learn the secrets of working Resdayn glass, and eventually mastered the art. In [PAWN_nameDef]'s hands, usually brittle glass becomes sturdy as steel, and sharp enough to pierce ebony.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master ebony smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Trained by some of the finest smiths to ever call Vvardenfell their home, [PAWN_nameDef] has developed [PAWN_possessive] knack for working ebony into a fine art.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master adamantium smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always quite the skilled smith, and eagerly jumped at the opportunity to craft armour for the Hands of the Queen. It took [PAWN_objective] quite some time, but the final products were perfect. [PAWN_nameDef] had clearly mastered working adamantium.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: heart stone expert
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While out wandering the beaches of Morrowind one day, [PAWN_nameDef] came across a strange smouldering stone. After a, very one sided, conversation with Master Neloth, it was revealed to [PAWN_nameDef] that what [PAWN_pronoun] found, was in fact a heart stone.\n\nSo began what felt like endless years of research, studying the hearts stones, and sourcing the locations of more. But it all paid off in the end, as [PAWN_nameDef] came away with unparalleled knowledge of these strange stones, though there was still plenty to learn about them.
